docs.snippet: A third release, “Triple 9,” was also licking its wounds. “Gods of Egypt” came in at No. 2, though, and “Deadpool” remained at No. 1....
docs.lead_paragraph: A third release, “Triple 9,” was also licking its wounds. “Gods of Egypt” came in at No. 2, though, and “Deadpool” remained at No. 1.

docs.snippet: On the eve of an Academy Awards under fire for a lack of diversity, Ebony magazine celebrated the best of black cinema as "black-ish" star Anthony Anderson and "Birth of a Nation" filmmaker Nate Parker urged fellow black stars to realize the power...
docs.lead_paragraph: On the eve of an Academy Awards under fire for a lack of diversity, Ebony magazine celebrated the best of black cinema as "black-ish" star Anthony Anderson and "Birth of a Nation" filmmaker Nate Parker urged fellow black stars to realize the power of the community to make lasting change in Hollywood.

headline.main: Ebony Celebrates Black Hollywood on the Oscar's Eve
